examples: one eye was blue but its fellow was brown

results.definition: a man who is the lover of a man or woman
a person who is member of one's class or profession
examples: he sent e-mail to his fellow hackers

results.definition: a friend who is frequently in the company of another
an informal form of address for a man
examples: Say, fellow, what are you doing?
there's a fellow at the door

results.definition: a member of a learned society
examples: he was elected a fellow of the American Physiological Association
